reference_details.raw_expression: Not visible, IF India is selected in previous field then Values is DOM IN, If international is selected then value is INT.
Dropdown values will come based on the account group/vendor type selection field as 2nd column of reference table 1.3.

Default behaviour is Invisible, If account group/vendor type is selected as ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE (any one) then derived it as Domestic. If Account group/vendor type is selected as ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS (any one) then derived it as import

If the Select the process type field value is India then country is India and Noneditable, If Select the process type field value is international then country is selectable dropdown. For dropdown values will be Column 2 - Column 5 of reference table 1.1.
Not visible, If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 5 on table 1.1
Not visible, If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 2 on table 1.1
Dropdown values will come from column 3 based on process type filter (DOM IN or INT) as column 1 of reference table 1.2
Mobile Number Validation based on the country selection

referenced_fields.condition_description: When Duplicate GST Result indicates duplicate found, Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory
When Duplicate PAN Result indicates duplicate found, Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory

intra_panel_references.logic_text: If duplicate vendor found based on 1. Duplicate GST 2. PAN Card 3. Email Id 4. Mobile Number 5. Bank Account Number then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory 6. Business Registration Number (Applicable only for Import and International)
intra_panel_references.notes: The logic also mentions 'Business Registration Number' for Import and International vendor types, which is a cross-panel reference (not in this panel)
